artifacts.summary: Pre-Coherent Bundle infrastructure with S-bounded Lindenbaum, SaturationClosure, and predicate definitions
Implementation summary documenting partial completion with mathematical gap analysis

partial_progress.blocker: Phases 5-6 require showing all pre-coherent families agree on modal truths. Different MCS can legitimately contain different non-necessary formulas, creating a fundamental mathematical gap in the pure product approach.

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented Pre-Coherent Bundle infrastructure including S-bounded Lindenbaum lemma, SaturationClosure, and predicate definitions. Phases 1-4 completed without sorries. Phases 5-6 have sorries due to fundamental mathematical gap: different MCS can disagree on non-necessary formulas, preventing automatic box coherence in the product construction.
